Title: 🔁🖼 ⚡️ TWO IMPACT UAVS ARE KILLED. THE ROCKETS DID NOT REACH THE...
Description: Forwarded From Commander of the Military Forces Mykola Oleshchuk⚡️ TWO STRIKE UAVS ARE KILLED. THE MISSILES DID NOT REACH THEIR GOALS➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖On September 22, 2024, the Russian occupiers stopped the attack of the 10th UAV type -Shahed- from Kursk directly. Most of the martyrs attacked the positions of the Ukrainian Defense Forces in the front-line territories of the Kharkiv region. The enemy also stagnated anti-radar missiles Kh-31P from the windy expanse over the Black Sea and two ballistic missiles - Iskander-M - from the Belgorod region and Crimea. The forces and methods of the anti-aircraft defense destroyed two strike missiles LA, two more - local treatment (fell on their own). Due to the active antidote, most of the hostile missiles did not reach their targets. Previously, there were no casualties or serious losses.🇺🇦 Together - to victory!➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖🦅 Commander of the Air Force, Lieutenant General Mikola Oleshchuk
